FuncDef: The display memory command displays the memory usage of a specific card. The display memory command displays the memory usage of a specific card.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the memory usage of all boards.
-

Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the CPU ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
